title: Hostel Students are requested to vacate
body: All hostel students are requested to vacate the hostel in order to comply with covid norms

title: Vaccines are mandatory
body: All hostel students are requested to vaccinate as soon as possible

title: End Semester Exams
body: End Semester exams are going to start from May19

title: Summer Training
body: All students are requested to attend summer Training

title: Class To Commence from July 14th
body: Classes for next Semester to commence from July 14th
